title: How to start content writing on Upwork - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello there, To start with, Upwork is a global platform where you find the collaboration between the businesses and professionals connecting each other for agencies and all their hiring needs. If you are a beginner to the field of content writing then i would suggest you to go ahead with upwork as a platform for you to work with for an experience. If you are the bread earner in your family then i would not suggest you to go for this as it has few points to refer to before you commit to the projects with upwork. This a place where jobs are posted and you bid ,hence if you are looking for a livelihood then it is absolutely a NO from my side. But as a student definitely yes , it will increase your knowledge on how you can earn money online. Answering to your question on how to start content writing these are the points to be kept in mind before you start:- Concentrate and pick your nicheWrite down points and communicate clearlyKeep your profiles updatedYour language skills matterCreate samples and a good portfolio Once you are ready with a strong portfolio approach legitimate employers, submit your samples and portfolio to collect your eligibility tokens , set your price to kick start earning. You need to have signed up accounts with paypal and upwork. Caution:-You need to be mindful before accepting any gig. Hope this will help you to start with your content writing with upwork. Best of Luck.

Create an accountSet up your profileThink first, what you can write (Article, Blog, Resume etc)Place bid on the jobs which will be suitable as per your skillI think it will take time as you are starting your career with Upwork to get your first job. But never give up in your life. I would like to suggest you that focus on the requirements of clients and write your cover letter precisely as per his understanding. Happy Upwork Journey :)
